## Testing

- [ ] Existing tests pass (`ant test` or JUnit)

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows existing project conventions
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or connection strings
- [ ] SQL queries use PreparedStatement (no string concatenation)
- [ ] Resources are properly closed (try-with-resources)
- [ ] Javadoc added for public methods (if applicable)
